title: Hoodia ruschii
text:
Hoodia ruschii is a species of <a href="stem%20succulent">stem succulent</a> plant in the family <a href="Apocynaceae">Apocynaceae</a>. It is <a href="Endemism">endemic</a> to <a href="Namibia">Namibia</a>. Its natural <a href="habitat">habitat</a>s are rocky areas and cold <a href="desert">desert</a>.
Description.
"Hoodia ruschii" reaches about 1/2 meter in height and has stout, grayish green stems covered in sharp, hard spines. It bears deep reddish-brown <a href="flower">flower</a>s which are medium-sized.
